participant_1.background:
I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise.
I enjoy drawing comics for my grandchildren to enjoy.
I love the smell of fresh-cut flowers.
I am glad that my wife's cancer is in remission and that she is able to enjoy the outdoors with me.
i enjoy taking late night walks when its completely dark.

participant_2.background:

My most valuable thing is my memory of seeing Ween live in concert.
i am from russia.
i started at google on an internship.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

content.text: I'm doing pretty well, thanks! I'm just enjoying a day off from work. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I just got back from a long hike in the mountains.
That sounds amazing! I love hiking. Where did you hike?
I hiked in the White Mountains in New Hampshire. It was beautiful!
I've never been to New Hampshire, but I've heard great things about the White Mountains. I'll have to check them out sometime.
You definitely should! They're beautiful in the fall.
I love the fall. The leaves are always so colorful.
Me too! I love going on walks in the fall and just taking in all the beauty.
Yeah, it's the perfect time to just slow down and enjoy the simple things in life.
I agree! I'm glad you had a great hike.
Thanks! I'm glad you're enjoying your day off.
Thanks! I'm going to go play some golf with my friends.
That sounds like fun! Enjoy your day.
